radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild dependent atelectasis in lung bases; normal liver with mild intrahepatic biliary ductal dilation; distended gallbladder with innumerable stones; thickening and mild adjacent stranding near gallbladder fundus; normal spleen, pancreas, adrenal glands, and kidneys; small amount of free fluid in the cul-de-sac; no evidence of colitis/diverticulitis; no pelvic or inguinal lymphadenopathy; new superior endplate compression deformity involving L1; degenerative changes at the symphysis pubis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Intrahepatic biliary ductal dilation not appreciated on concurrent ultrasound; thickening and mild adjacent stranding near the gallbladder fundus new from prior CT; new compression deformity involving L1 not present in prior imaging.
